title: Correction: Genomic insights into novel extremotolerant bacteria isolated from the NASA Phoenix mission spacecraft assembly cleanrooms - Microbiome

content:
Correction: Microbiome 13, 117 (2025)

https://doi.org/10.1186/s40168-025–02082−1

Following publication of the original article [1], the author reported that there are changes needs to be made to Table 2. Below are the specific changes. Red letters are the changes to be made and blue letters have no changes.

  1. C, Cultures were not viable

The original article [1] has been corrected.

Reference

  1. Schultz J, Jamil T, Sengupta P, et al. Genomic insights into novel extremotolerant bacteria isolated from the NASA Phoenix mission spacecraft assembly cleanrooms. Microbiome. 2025;13:117. https://doi.org/10.1186/s40168-025-02082-1.
